attributes.action: Sadiq Khan to fulfill his election promise and FREEZE tube fare for LONDONERS
attributes.background: Sadiq Khan fares freeze on public transport would apply only to single journeys which wasnt what was promised to Londoners so either he fulfills what he promised and extends it to  weekly monthly and yearly travelcard as its time for politicians to be liable for what they promise

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
